chooseUs.infoTitle:
We craft memories,
not just trips.

differentCard.infoParagraph:
At Viar, we believe travel is about creating unforgettable experiences. Our dedicated team  offers personalised service to ensure every journey is enjoyable and filled with   meaningful moments.
We choose the best places, give you expert advice and take care of everything so you can  enjoy your trip. With Viar, your adventure is always unique.

faq.leftQuestion1: How can I book a tour?
faq.leftQuestion2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.leftQuestion3: Can I customize my tour package?
faq.leftAnswer1: You can book a tour directly through our website or by contacting our support team via email or phone
faq.leftAnswer2: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
faq.leftAnswer3: Yes, we offer customizable tour packages to fit your specific preferences and needs.
faq.rightQuestion3: Is travel insurance included in the package?
faq.rightAnswer1: You can cancel up to 7 days before the tour for a full refund. Cancellations made within 7 days are subject to a 50% fee.
faq.rightAnswer2: Yes, we offer special discounts for groups of 5 or more. Please contact us for more details.
faq.rightAnswer3: No, travel insurance is not included. However, we highly recommend purchasing travel insurance before your trip.
faq.fAQParagraph: Have questions? Our FAQ section provides answers to some of the most common inquiries about our trips.

footer.ull: Design and Developed By Silicon Hub.

line.infoParagraph1:
Learn about our resort's history and vision. A
simple idea has become a top destination, with
great service and memories for all.
line.infoParagraph2:
Learn about our resort's history and vision. What
began as a simple idea has grown into a top
destination, driven by a passion for great service
and memorable experiences.
line.infoParagraph3:
Learn about our resort and why it was created.
We wanted to create a unique place where you
can relax, be comfortable and have fun.
line.infoParagraph4:
We want to grow and make a bigger impact by
using new technology and making our service
better for customers.

modal.infoParagraph: We will get back to you shortly.

resort.infoTitle: Experience a Day at Our Resort

reviewCarousel.quote1: The best experience we ever had
reviewCarousel.text1: At Viar, we take pride in crafting unforgettable journeys, and nothing speaks louder than the voices of our happy travelers.
reviewCarousel.text2: Viar made our trip exceptional with seamless planning and incredible destinations. We will come back for sure!
reviewCarousel.text3: Thanks to Viar, our adventure was full of excitement and joy. Highly recommended!
reviewCarousel.infoParagraph: The positive feedback we receive reflects the quality of our tour. Guests consistently appreciate our trips and personalised service.

homePage.carouselParagraph: Discover unforgettable trips and amazing places around the world with us
homePage.infoParagraph: Plan your next adventure with Viar and explore a world of stunninglandscapes, rich cultures, and unforgettable experiences.
